Name: 粤剧帝女花VR版
About the game: This application uses motion capture, modeling, animation binding and other technologies to create an immersive virtual reality stage scene, so that users can experience and watch the imperial and DiNvHua opera. Users can watch this visual feast from any free angle in an all-round way
